# What is factory design pattern?

  - Factory DP that provides you the centarlised factory functions to generate the intances of mongoose models/controllers. 

  - Benefits of Factory DP:

    1. Encapsulation
    2. Consistency
    3. Flexibility
    4. Less code
    5. Easy to test

  # What is mongodb queries?

    - Mongodb queries -> operations performed to retrieve or manipluate ot analyse data stored in mongoDB database.

    - why do need mongodb queries?
      
        - the intention to use mongodb queries are to filter out the data or to do sorting or to do the pagination.

  # what is query params?

    - In the URL everthing starts after the question mark.
    - It is used to access the data that is sent in a non-structured way typically for sorting, filtering, searching and paginating the data based on API call.
    - localhost:3000/search?sid=0pm%2C0o7&sort=popularity&param=8755&p%5B%5D=facets.rating%255B%255D%3D3%25E2%2598%2585%2B%2526%2Babove&param=443&hpid=-9HuwFIVtikIZ8W21KTsvKp7_Hsxr70nj65vMAAFKlc%3D&%3D&p%5B%5D=facets.price_range.from%3D599&p%5B%5D=facets.price_range.to%3DMax&p%5B%5D=facets.type%255B%255D%3DHome%2BAudio%2BSpeaker&p%5B%5D=facets.type%255B%255D%3DGaming%2BSpeaker&p%5B%5D=facets.type%255B%255D%3DHome%2BTheatre&p%5B%5D=facets.type%255B%255D%3DLaptop%252FDesktop%2BSpeaker&p%5B%5D=facets.type%255B%255D%3DMobile%252FTablet%2BSpeaker&p%5B%5D=facets.type%255B%255D%3DSoundbar
